Cave.title: Cave
Cave.description: West entrance to the Molten Core.

Cave.title: Cave
Cave.description: North entrance to the Molten Core.

Cave.title: Cave
Cave.description: South entrance to the Molten Core.

Cave.title: Cave
description: Leads to the tunnel connecting Colony and Blood Forest

Portals.title: Gate to Level 7
Portals.description: This pocket area is can only be accessed by Level 7. This gate takes you back to the point of entry

Breakable Wall.title: Breakable Walls
Breakable Wall.description: Left click to break the wall.

Rel Por Stones.title: Rel Por Stone
Rel Por Stones.description: Teleports you to a nearby area. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Hall Of Virtue
Stairs.description: Leads down to the Hall of Virtue.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Colony
Stairs.description: This leads back up to the Colony

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 5
Stairs.description: This leads to the South West of Level 5

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 3
Stairs.description: This leads to the middle of Level 3

Stairs.title: Stairs to Level 5
Stairs.description: This leads to the South East of Level 5

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Abyssal Core
Stairs.description: This leads back to north side of the Abyssal Core.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Abyssal Core
Stairs.description: This leads back to south side of the Abyssal Core.

Teleport Tiles.title: Teleport to Colony Outpost
Teleport Tiles.description: Teleports you to the Colony outpost. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Teleport Tiles.title: Teleport to Level 1
Teleport Tiles.description: Teleports you to the Anhk room on Level 1. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Waystar.title: Waystar
Waystar.description: Summons a moongate to Colony for a short duration. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.

Bosses.title: Navery Nighteyes
Bosses.description: Special: Summons spiders and does Nemesis. This is a progressive spawn: Kill the spiders until the boss spawns

Bosses.title: Ratmen Chief
Bosses.description: Special: Summons totems that do AOE damage

Revealers.title: Time Lurker
Revealers.description: Reveals in a large radius. Casts spells and does a backstab melee attack occasionally.

Knock.title: Knock
Knock.description:
All Doors within 3 tiles become opened and stay unlocked for 15 seconds
Each Chest within 3 tiles has a 50% chance to become unlocked

Shrine.title: Honesty Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring the Unstable Time Crystal to this location. You can find the crystal at randoms encounters containing two Bedlam Gazers and a bag on the ground. Turn in the crystal and you will get a key to take to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward.

Shrine.title: Sacrifice Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring the Bowl of Tears to this location. You can find the bowl randomly on the ground throughout the dungeon. Turn in the bowl with one other player here and you will get a key to take to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward. The entrance to this location is on Level 7.

Shrine.title: Shrine Keys
Shrine.description: Bring any Shrine Keys to the appropiate section of the Hall of Virtue for a reward.

Shrine.title: Gromgur Wisehead the mage
Shrine.description: Bring him the Timekeeper's Hourglass, a Martian Rock, Ancient Shackles and 10k Colonial marks to make a Timekeeper's Ward. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Clevertail the lenscrafter
Shrine.description: Bring him a Glass Sword, a Piece of Magic Marble, a Cataract Lens and 10k Colonial marks to make a refactory Lens. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Libram the beggar
Shrine.description: Bring him the Tear of the Tide and the Emberheart to get a broken waystar. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Iolanthe the knight
Shrine.description: Bring her the complete collection of small virtue stones from the Mirrors in the Ankh room. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Jeanette the priestess
Shrine.description: Bring her the complete collection of the anti-virtue stones. You must collect the virtue stones from the mirrors and take them to Level 8. Complete the anti-virtue bosses to receive the anti-virtue stones. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Billingsly the strange alchemist
Shrine.description: Bring him a vial of ancient blood and an inert magic rune. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Nimblefinger the fine craftsman
Shrine.description: Bring him a void slime, precious time gem and a chunk of goblin soap. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Lora the gate pass holder
Shrine.description: Bring him a bounty notice to exchange for a colony gate pass. Say trade when you have the items.

Shrine.title: Quicktail the garrison commander
Shrine.description: Bring him a bounty notice to exchange for a reward. Say trade when you have the items.

Rare Spawns.title: Shrieking Mandrake
Rare Spawns.description: Spawns in the metal chest. Long respawn.

Books.title: Tear of the Tide and Ember Heart
Books.description: Important lore book for a nearby quest.

Books.title: The Colonial Waystar
Books.description: Important lore book for the whereabouts of Graham.

Books.title: The Garoo at the Zoo
Books.description: Important lore book for the Prevalia Zoo.

Community Chests.title: Community Chests
Community Chests.description: These chests are free for anyone to store items in. Take what you need; leave what you can..

Voidball.title: Voidball
Voidball.description: A field to play Voidball on. Traps are optional. There is a friendly Exothrugg nearby...

Chests.title: Metal Chest
Chests.description: This chest is locked and requires a knock rune to open. Can contain special/rare loot.

Chests.title: Wooden Chest
Chests.description: This chest is unlocked and can contain special/rare loot.

Chests.title: Metal Box
Chests.description: This chest is unlocked and can contain special/rare loot.

Chests.title: Wooden Box
Chests.description: This chest is unlocked and can contain special/rare loot.

Traps.title: Justice Ambush
Traps.description: You will be ambushed by many Apostate soldiers here if you are carrying the Justice staff. This will leave you unable to move from some time.

Traps.title: Reflection Trap
Traps.description: You will be ambushed by three reflections here.
